main.description: Main fill background color used for components in rest state (Buttons, form controls)

content-light.description: Text or icon Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when main is used as a bg color

content-dark.description: Text or icon fill color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when outline background state is used

contained-hover-background.description: Background fill color for contained actions in hover state

contained-active-background.description: Background fill color for contained actions in active state

focus.description: Outline color for contained & outlined actions in focus state (Button, icon button, input, dropdown, etc)

contained-disabled-background.description: Background fill color for contained actions in disabled state (Button)

outlined-hover-background.description: Background fill color for outlined actions in hover state (Button, icon button, input, dropdown)

outlined-active-background.description: Background fill color for outlined actions in active state (Button)

outlined-rest-border.description: Outline fill color for outlined actions in rest state (Button, chip)
